page.title: 03EDUCATION - PRIMARY
page.content:
Magherafelt Controlled Primary School was opened on 27th June 1960. It was built to replace two schools in the town and several schools in the surrounding rural area.On roll at present there are 420 pupils.There are 13 classes and 15 members of staff. The headmaster is Mr. W.J. Mills.
St. Joseph's and St. Mary's Primary Schools are maintained Roman Catholic Schools.They share a common site on the Castledawson Road.The headmaster of St. Joseph's is Mr. P.Kilpatrick. There are 277 boy on roll in nine classes. The headmistress of St. Mary's is Sister Margaret.There 272 girls on roll in nine classes.Each school has 10 members of staff and in addition they share another teacher.
